title: The National Psoriasis Foundation
description: The National Psoriasis Foundation is here to help you get the treatment you need while promoting research to find a cure for psoriasis and psoriatic arthritis.
cleaned_text: The mission of the National Psoriasis Foundation is to drive efforts to cure psoriatic disease and improve the lives of those affected. Over 8 million people in the U.S. have psoriasis. Nearly a third of them will develop psoriatic arthritis. A world without psoriatic disease and the related burdens is possible. We won't stop until you have the cure you deserve.
